The passing of knowledge and traditions from generation to generation is a time-honored occupation. Teachers exist to strengthen their populations with literacy, history, and advanced sciences, but most of all with inspiration. Most teachers provide general knowledge so their students are well-rounded, but some are experts or even masters of a single discipline. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 13 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8 [Teacher](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3589) **Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 139 **Perception** +4 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1); up to 3 additional languages **Skills** [Academia Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +14, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +5, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +5, [one additional Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +14 **Str** +0 **Dex** +0 **Con** -1 **Int** +4 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +3 **Academic Specialist** For academic encounters, a teacher is a 4th-level challenge.
**Font of Knowledge** The teacher can attempt to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367) on any general subject with a +10 modifier.
**Inspirational Presence** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=590), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647)) 50 feet. Any of the teacher's students in the aura gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367). **Items** cane (functions as [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=367)), textbook, [Writing Set](/Equipment.aspx?ID=63) --- **AC** 12 **Fort** +1 **Ref** +2 **Will** +6 **HP** 5 --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** cane +4 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)), **Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning **Melee** fist +4 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning
